Package uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps

Class Path

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.Path
public class Path
extends Object
It is responsible for determining the path, i.e. instructions on how to fly and when to take readings.
Author:
Michal Sadowski

    • Path

      public Path​(ArrayList<SensorLocation> sensors, com.mapbox.geojson.Point init_loc, ArrayList<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Polygon> no_fly_zones)
      Parameters:
      sensors - an unordered list of sensors to consider
      init_loc - start and end location
      no_fly_zones - areas to avoid in JTS type

  • Method Details

    • generatePath

      public ArrayList<PathStep> generatePath()
      Generates a path starting at the init_loc of the object, visiting all sensors, and returns close to init_loc
      Returns:
      returns the path

    • sensorsPath

      private ArrayList<PathStep> sensorsPath​(ArrayList<SensorLocation> ordered_sensors)
      Calculates a path between sensors in a given order and determines after which move the drone should be in range of specific sensors
      Parameters:
      ordered_sensors - an ordered ArrayList of sensors to visit
      Returns:
      the path between the specified ordered sensors

    • twoPointsPath

      private ArrayList<PathStep> twoPointsPath​(SensorLocation s1, SensorLocation s2, Double proximity)
      Calculates the steps (angles at which to move) to get from sensor s1 to a location at maximum distance of proximity to s2. Each step determines whether to take a reading after a move.
      Parameters:
      s1 - sensor to start the path at
      s2 - sensor to finish the path at
      proximity - the maximum distance from the destination point
      Returns:
      returns a list of steps

    • chooseAngle

      private Integer chooseAngle​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point curr_point, com.mapbox.geojson.Point dest_point, Integer last_angle)
      Choose angle to indicate best direction to move in to reach destination
      Parameters:
      curr_point - the current location of the drone
      dest_point - the destination point
      last_angle - the angle, which got us to curr_point
      Returns:
      returns an angle, in which the drone should move

    • nextBestAngle

      private Integer nextBestAngle​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point curr_point, com.mapbox.geojson.Point dest_point, Integer closest_angle, ArrayList<Integer> angles_tried)
      Determine next available point. Keeps increasing/decreasing the angle until not forbidden. Then returns better one.
      Parameters:
      curr_point - current location
      dest_point - destination location
      closest_angle - the angle closest to a straight line but resulting in a forbidden move
      angles_tried - list of already discarded angles
      Returns:
      next best angle

    • angleBasedOnPoints

      private Integer angleBasedOnPoints​(int decreased_angle, int increased_angle, com.mapbox.geojson.Point curr_point, com.mapbox.geojson.Point dest_point)
      Chooses one of two angles based on four factors: 1. Ratio of forbidden moves out of the possible 36 angles at the point resulting in moving in the angle direction 2. Whether a move in default direction at such point would be legal 3. Distance to the destination at such points 4. How close the considered angles are to the closest angle These factors are given weights: 2, 2, 2, 1 respectively. If the ratio is similar for both angles,the distance weight is increased by one
      Parameters:
      decreased_angle - one angle to consider
      increased_angle - another angle to consider
      curr_point - current location
      dest_point - destination point
      Returns:
      the better scoring angle

    • adjustAngle

      private Integer adjustAngle​(int angle, int step, com.mapbox.geojson.Point curr_point, ArrayList<Integer> tried_angles)
      Find first not forbidden angle by adjusting it by the step size
      Parameters:
      angle - the angle to adjust
      step - either +10 or -10
      curr_point - current location
      tried_angles - list of angles already discarded
      Returns:
      first allowed angle

    • closestAngle

      private Integer closestAngle​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point pt1, com.mapbox.geojson.Point pt2)
      Choose a multiple of 10 angle closest to represent the straight line from pt1 to pt2
      Parameters:
      pt1 - starting point
      pt2 - end point
      Returns:
      Returns the closest angle being multiple of 10

    • angle

      private Double angle​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point pt1, com.mapbox.geojson.Point pt2)
      Compute the exact angle between two points on a map with 0 = west, 90 = north
      Parameters:
      pt1 - first point
      pt2 - second point
      Returns:
      angle in degrees

    • ratioOfForbidden

      private Double ratioOfForbidden​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point pt)
      Calculates the ratio of forbidden moves out of the possible 36 angles: [forbidden moves]/[36 possible directions]
      Parameters:
      pt - the point at which to calculate the ratio
      Returns:
      returns a ratio of forbidden directions to the number of all possible directions

    • forbidden

      private boolean forbidden​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point from, int angle)
      Checks whether a move would result inside a no fly zone or outside the confinement area, using the JTS library.
      Parameters:
      from - starting point
      angle - direction of the move
      Returns:
      Returns true if move is forbidden, false, otherwise

    • moveAlongPath

      private com.mapbox.geojson.Point moveAlongPath​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point pt, ArrayList<PathStep> path)
      Calculates the location resulting from moving along the specified path
      Parameters:
      pt - starting point
      path - the path to follow
      Returns:
      Returns resulting location Point

    • move

      public static com.mapbox.geojson.Point move​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point start_point, Integer angle)
      Calculates the location resulting from a single move in direction of the angle
      Parameters:
      start_point - the point from which to move
      angle - the direction of the move
      Returns:
      the resulting new location Point

    • chooseOrder

      private ArrayList<SensorLocation> chooseOrder()
      Determines the order in which to visit sensors. It selects the closest sensor, then sensor closest to that sensor and so on.
      Returns:
      Returns an ordered ArrayList of SensorLocations

    • chooseClosest

      private SensorLocation chooseClosest​(ArrayList<SensorLocation> points, com.mapbox.geojson.Point ipt)
      Chooses a point from an ArrayList of Sensor Locations that closes to the specified point
      Parameters:
      points - is an ArrayList of SensorLocations
      ipt - is a Point to which the distance is measured
      Returns:
      returns a SensorLocation that is closest to point ipt

    • angle360

      private Integer angle360​(Integer angle)
      Converts angles to a value in [0, 360) degrees
      Parameters:
      angle - is an angle in degrees
      Returns:
      returns an angle that is in [0, 360) degrees

    • distance

      public static Double distance​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point pt1, com.mapbox.geojson.Point pt2)
      Calculates distance between two points using the Pythagoras's theorem
      Parameters:
      pt1 - Point 1
      pt2 - Point 2
      Returns:
      distance in degrees
